verses.verse: For the director.[b] With stringed instruments. Of David.
O God, hear my cry and listen to my prayer.
From the ends of the earth[c] I call to you, with a heart that is fainting away; set me high upon a rock.
For you are my refuge, a tower of strength against the enemy.
I will abide in your tent forever and find refuge in the shelter of your wings.[d] Selah
For you, O God, have heard my vows and granted me the heritage of those who fear your name.[e]
[f]Add length of days to the life of the king; may his years be prolonged for many generations.
May he be enthroned in Godâ€™s presence forever, and may your kindness and faithfulness watch over him.
